news_header: Kamala Harris labels Donald Trump as a fascist during a speech in Philadelphia.
news_text: In a speech in Philadelphia, U.S. presidential candidate Kamala Harris affirmed that she believes Republican opponent Donald Trump is a fascist. This statement came in response to a direct question from supporters. Additionally, John Kelly, former head of the White House, mentioned in an interview that Trump has often spoken of Hitler in an admirable way, reinforcing the view that Trump exhibits fascist tendencies.
